TestItem.Stem: 9. All of the following are implied in paragraph 5 as contributing to the failure of Pickett's Charge EXCEPT

Distractor_list.Distractor: (A) General Lee's refusal to listen to his generals' opinion
(B) the Confederate artillery's failure to cause much damage
(C) the Union's center being stronger than anticipateds
(D) the Confederate infantry not performing at full strength
